ComicInfo.Summary:
Two B.P.R.D. teams make their way through the monster-filled streets of a Manhattan wasteland in order to reach the Black Flameâ€™s fortress and take down his army.
First of five special covers celebrating 20 years of Hellboy!

The fall of New York City!
The reign of the Black Flame!
